title: #34 - That Episode with Inner Circle app founder David Vermeulen
description:
Years ago he was ready to meet someone. But he wasn’t happy with the apps and ways to meet people.

So, he took things into his own hands and created his own app!

This week’s guest is David Vermeulen. He is the founder of Inner circle, the app where you’ll find some of the world's most inspiring single professionals with similar backgrounds and interests. 

Plus, we take YOUR dating and relationship questions!

Download the Inner Circle app from the Apple App store

To learn how Maria can help you find love in 2021, go to: https://linktr.ee/agapematch

Follow Maria on Instagram Follow Maria on TikTok Have a question for Maria? Visit http://askamatchmaker.com Enroll in Agape Match’s Group Coaching Intensive: https://agapematch.com/events To learn more about how Maria and how her team can help you find love, visit agapematch.com
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
